commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basc267b8a"

diff:
"c267b8a [OS/2] fix build break when linking widget following bug 393109
diff --git a/widget/src/os2/Makefile.in b/widget/src/os2/Makefile.in
index 26f8caf..5324787 100644
--- a/widget/src/os2/Makefile.in
+++ b/widget/src/os2/Makefile.in
@@ -106,6 +106,7 @@ EXTRA_DSO_LDOPTS = \
 		$(EXTRA_DSO_LIBS) \
 		$(MOZ_UNICHARUTIL_LIBS) \
 		$(MOZ_COMPONENT_LIBS) \
+		$(LCMS_LIBS) \
 		$(NULL)
 
 ifdef MOZ_ENABLE_CAIRO_GFX
"
